    io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.caravan.api
    Interfaces for usage of the Rhyme framework with other wcm.io.Caravan projects (e.g.

    • Uses of CaravanRhyme in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.caravan.api

      Method parameters in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.caravan.api with type arguments of type CaravanRhyme 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <RequestContextType>
      void      		 CaravanRhymeRequestCycle.processRequest(javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo requestUri, javax.ws.rs.container.AsyncResponse response, Function<CaravanRhyme,RequestContextType> requestContextConstructor, Function<RequestContextType,? extends io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.resources.LinkableResource> resourceImplConstructor)
      Handles the full request cycle: Create a CaravanRhyme instance Pass that instance on to the given function to create a request context instance Pass that context on to the given function to create the resource implementation to be rendered Render the resource using the JaxRsAsyncHalResponseRenderer service Catch and handle any exceptions that are thrown in the previous steps
